name: 5x/Week Hypertrophy Split
description: Upper/Lower/Pull/Push/Legs split. Probably produces more gains than any other 5-day program. All working sets at 0-1 RIR, 5-10 reps, 2+ min rest.
creator: @deanttraining

activity.name: Zone 2 Cardio
activity.notes: Heart rate 120-140bpm. Walk, bike, or light jog.

activity.name: Zone 2 Cardio
activity.notes: Heart rate 120-140bpm. Walk, bike, or light jog.

tips: All working sets prescribed at 0-1 RIR, with 1 RIR preferred
If you don't trust your RIR gauge, take sets to ~0 RIR/failure
Do NOT take 50/50 reps on hack squats or SLDLs to avoid bad positions
2 minutes rest between working sets is the FLOOR â€” 3 or more preferred
60-90 seconds rest between warmup sets is fine
restGuidelines: 0-1 RIR on all working sets. 2+ min rest between working sets (3+ preferred). 60-90s between warmup sets.
